TestDataConversion module¶

TestDataConversion.count_data(data_list)¶

Count patient size from given data list.

This function counts patient number from input data list according to element starting with ‘TSH’, used to count patient size, where each patient gets Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH) test.

Parameters

data_list (list) – data list containing element ‘TSH, #, # …’

Returns

the calculated patient size

Return type

int

TestDataConversion.diagnosis_data(data_list)¶

Diagnose Thyroid Stimulating Hormone level from given data list.

This function reads in a list containing Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH) levels and insert corresponding TSH diagnosis labeled as hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism or normal thyroid function before the elemnt containing TSH levels. Any number greater than 4.0 will be labeled as hypothyroidism. any number less than 1.0 hyperthyroidism, any number in between (inclusive) normal thyroid function.

Parameters

data_list (list) – data list containing element ‘TSH, #, # …’

Returns

same data list as input w/ diagnosis before each element

formatted ‘TSH, #, # …’

Return type

list

TestDataConversion.dictization_data(data_list)¶

Convert given data list to data dictionary.

This function takes in a single patient data list, and convert it to a dictionary for convenience of future data storage. Input data list should contain and only contain elements ‘Full Name’, ‘Age’, ‘Gender’, ‘Diagnosis’, and ‘TSH Level’ in order. Returned dictionary contains keys and corresponding values of ‘First Name’, ‘Last Name’, ‘Age’, ‘Gender’, ‘Diagnosis’, and ‘TSH’, where datatype of value of ‘Age’ is int, ‘TSH’ int list, others str.

Parameters

data_list (list) – data list containing specified element as above

Returns

Converted dictionary with same elements as in input data list

Return type

dict

TestDataConversion.interface()¶

Integrate all functionality in a user interface.

This fucntion integrates complete functionality in a user interface. On the console, this interface will ask users to input the filename that they want to process.

Returns

None

TestDataConversion.read_data(filename)¶

Read in patient info from given filename.

This function reads in patient info before recognizing ‘END’ from user-specified filename and returns as a list. Every single readline occupies one element of returned list, and trailing or leading spaces will be ignored.

Parameters

filename (str) – filename w/ extension

Returns

read-in data

Return type

list

TestDataConversion.save_data(dict)¶

Save given data dictionary in a .json file.

This function reads in a dictionary and save it in a .json file, whose filename is specified by values of ‘First Name’ and ‘Last Name’ in input dictionary, formatted as ‘FirstName-LastName.json’.

Parameters

dict (dict) – data dictionary containing elements ‘First Name’ and ‘Last Name’

Returns

None
